amendment.description: To end the appointments of presidential Czars who have not been subject to the advice and consent of the Senate and to prohibit funds for any salaries and expenses for appointed Czars.

action.text: Amendment SA 499 proposed by Senator Vitter.

vote.text: Amendment SA 499, under the order of 6/22/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 95.
